Text:
I actually totally forgot about this series. I hope there is a 5, since I hate inconclusive comic series.

Btw, do you know what happened to America's got Powers #6?

yes Calel1234, i know what happened. the habitually late bryan hitch is its artist.  ;-)

seriously, i suspect he stopped drawing it as marvel was probably pressuring him to get age of ultron done. which he didn't get done, and he's now been replaced with two b-list artists for the final issues.

the image website says #6 is shipping TBD (to be determined). it will probably come out later this spring. by the way, it's now added another issue to the miniseries so expect to wait another 3-6 months for the conclusion in #7!
and by the way comics fans, carrie kelley from dark knight returns is the next robin.
that's some funny shit, I wondered what the hell was going on. thx for the up stf
Thanks for the insight.... Another great upload.
What do you expect?They're Robins..they never last.Still weird that Bruce keeps recruiting teens.He really can't get it that they KEEP DYING.Tsk Tsk
Great series. Do you or know where I can find the series Nth Man: The Ultimate Ninja?
don't really understand the need myself. they ought to at least kill off 5 or 6 of the robins they already have before bringing on more.
just a question. Have you heard of a series called Troublemakers. I would love to read the entire run.

I really, really liked Damian as the last Robin... Idk why they had to kill him off to make a new Robin. Makes me think it was for political/social reasons that they picked a girl rather than best interest of the storyline.

i guess he needs somebody to yell at, other than alfred  ;-)

the new 52 should have eliminated tim and jason, if they were keeping nightwing and damian. just too many supporting characters, imho.

troublemakers can be found here http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7833326/  , along with all the other acclaim comics titles. check out quantum & woody if you want another good one! it's soon to be relaunched at the new valiant.
again thank you. you and the other uploaders have helped us too many times and we all appreciate it
you're very welcome riverchase. thanks for saying thanks.

having only nightwing and damian would've been ideal. instead, not only is there going to be yet another robin character added to the mix, once damian inevitably gets dunked in a lazarus pit we'll have one more than we even started with
comawhite2008, when i can get all the issues to finish downloading, i'll post a torrent of the complete nth man
Much appreciated.  :)
im getting really bad speed for the acclaim/valiant upload im not even at 50 percent yet

I was reading these the other day; thanks for the ULs!  But, here's a link to the marvel website that shows the covers to issues 5-8:

http://marvel.com/comics/series/14803/brilliant_2011_-_present
did that ever finish for you, riverchase?
Actually, I think Tomasi kind of hinted that Carrie's not actually the new Robin.
peter said she may not be, especially in his follow-up interview with the post. however, bear in mind that tim drake wasn't robin for half a year in the batman comic, either...
